alert.note: Alert for Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 8:12PM MDT until April 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River at Nashua affecting Valley County. For the Milk River...including Saco, Tampico, Malta, Dodson, Glasgow, Nashua...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River at Nashua. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 25.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM MDT Wednesday was 26.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday morning and continue falling to 18.6 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning by 1130 AM MDT.
